title: Fine for a short stay but avoid bar food
text:
Modern, clean, nice bathrooms. Mattresses very thin but beds comfy enough. Noisy enough , windows aren’t great but u suppose to be expected in the city, Really nice fresh breakfast. Check in process very slow. 
We only stayed 1 night before our flight home , 

Ate dinner there. Avoid at all costs. Menu limited and food the worst we have ever had. Service slow. Food arrived cold and was then heated up in a microwave and given back. Meat in the burgers disgusting and vegetables with the salmon limp , overcooked & tasteless. Kids could not eat any of their meal at all yet we were charged for all the food, majority of which we couldn’t eat. 

I would stay here again for a short stay but not eat dinner in the hotel.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Très bonne expérience
text: J'ai séjourné 3 nuits au sein de l'hôtel lors d'un déplacement professionnel. Je suis très contente de mon séjour. Le personnel est très sympathique, agréable et très poli. La chambre est impeccable, rien à redire. L'hôtel dispose d'un micro-ondes bien pratique lorsque l'on ne souhaite pas manger au restaurant de l'hôtel. Le petit déjeuner est également très complet. Certainement un me adresse que je garderai pour mes prochains déplacements.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Fijn hotel met goed personeel
text: Twee kamers genomen. Uitstekend personeel. Zeer behulpzaam. Kamers zijn prima. Niet heel luxe. Wel schoon en goede bedden. Fijne douche. Ontbijtbuffet is uitgebreid. Niet veel warm. Wel goede kwaliteit en voldoende keuze. Hotel ligt vlakbij metrostation Porte d’Italie
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Albergo consigliato
text: L'albergo ha camere per famiglie difficili da trovare a Parigi. Camere pulite. È in una buona posizione, quartiere tranquillo, la metro è praticamente davanti all'albergo. L'unica cosa che posso dire che non mi è piaciuta è la colazione, essendo celiaca non hanno un angolo dedicato al senza glutine.  Ti scaldono tre pezzi di pane che però non ci puoi mettere in mezzo neanche marmellate o affettati perché è tutto contaminato con il glutine. Essendo una catena così grande mi aspettavo di più.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Une très bonne adresse
text: Hôtel tout à fait confortable, vraiment bien insonorisé (et je suis super sensible aux bruits), proposant un bon buffet de petit déjeuner. Fort commodément situé (métro Maison Blanche) pour toutes activités. Personnel agréable et sympathique. Je garde en mémoire pour une prochaine visite.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Olympics 2024
text: Hotel che ha rispettato le aspettative. Pulito, vicinissimo alla metro ed al tram. 5 minuti a piedi dalla nuova linea 14 della metro che collega con aeroporto di Orly. Ottima colazione abbondante e di qualità. Possibilità di cenare durante la settimana.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: The hotel staff were all excellent from the reception to the cleaners and the breakfast buffet staff
text: We stayed as part of a package for the Olympics and so the hotel was quite full. Even though there were lots of other guests the staff were extremely friendly and welcoming from the receptioist to the cleaning staff and the staff in the breakfast buffet. I feel I have to congratulate the staff on the breakfast buffet especially as even though the place was full and items on the buffet kept running out the staff were superb in refilling the different foods and in cleaning away the dirty dishes and getting in clean cutlery and dishes. The staff made the stay excellent!
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Beware, this hotel is owned by Novotel
text:
We arrived hot and tired from Basil, Switzerland.  We planned to stay for four days as a mini vacation in Paris before going home.  We were given a very small, cramped room.  The bed is not a bed but a pallet or a poorly made futon.  The sheets were wrinkled and the bed appeared as though a small child had made the bed.  The bed itself is not conducive to good rest.  There were only two towels in the bathroom and no glasses of any kind.  There was not facilities for making tea or coffee, no refrigerator and  a tiny window that looks out over all of Paris, if it wasn't so dirty. No use trying to take a picture of the view.  They cover this by pulling the drapes over the tiny window leaving the room dark and uninviting.  I believe all the rooms are like this because the building itself sits on a tiny bit of property.  Since it's Paris it's understandable but not the dirt.  
I spoke with the manager, but he knows nothing about the surrounding area.   He was also unwilling to address any of my concerns about the hotel. 
I would not recommend any hotel operated by Novotel.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Hotel comodissimo per visitare la città
text: Siamo appena tornati da Parigi e abbiamo passato in questo hotel 4 notti. Siamo stati molto bene! La camera non è grandissima (ma neanche piccolissima per tre persone). Il bagno comunque abbastanza grande e confortevole. L’hotel è molto pulito e la colazione è ottima, con qualità eccellente. La posizione poi è comodissima: a 100 metri c’è la fermata della metro 7 che porta praticamente in tutta la città e c’è anche il tram. Soddisfattissimi 🤭
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Budget Hotel, very very basic
text: Budget hotel, expected for what we paid. Easy access to the metro and good enough for, site seeing. A distance outside the main city but metro 2 minute walk. Breakfast, ok but basic. Uncomfortable beds and noisey construction site nearby. I would go closer to the city next time.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Ótima opção em Paris
text: O hotel está perto de uma estação de metrô, Carrefour e restaurantes. Bairro seguro. O café da manhã é bem gostoso, porém repetitivo. Há café e chocolate quente sempre que quiser. Como estamos no inverno europeu chegar e ter essa opção sem custo foi uma boa surpresa. O quarto de tamanho mediano, camas confortáveis porém não há frigobar, cofre e nem microondas.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Très bien, bonne localisation à proximité immédiate du métro
text: Excellent accueil au check in, les chambres sont correctes et le petit déjeuner est très bien. Ce qui m'a le plus frappé c'est l'isolation phonique qui est parfaite : on entend aucun bruit de la rue ni aucun autre bruit des chambres avoisinantes. C'est tellement rare que ça doit être souligné.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Great service!
text: The hotel is a little far away from the major attractions in Paris, but the rooms and complimentary breakfast were very nice. Yannick was extremely helpful at the front counter! Overall a great experience for the price and I would recommend it to other travelers.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Miserable Stay.
text: Horrible service, lumpy bed, no room service at all, unhelpful staff. Decent restaurants nearby. Avoid if possible. Beware of trying to get a cab or Uber to airport. Allot at least two hours. Almost missed our flight because hotel’s location requires passing through HEAVY Paris traffic to airport.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Good hotel for tourists
text:
Room was good. Stay was comfortable. Breakfast was good. We had booked quadruple room. The two beds on the sofas was not at all comfortable. Management needs to take care of this. This bed gave me back ache.
Hotel and staf were good. Location was perfect. Good for tourists.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Deluso
text: Sono stato ospite in un hotel Ibis già altre volte, mi sentivo di andare sul sicuro. Ma a mia sorpresa non è stato così. Appena arrivati la camera era pulita, ma del secondo giorno l'addetto alle stanze si è limitato semplicemente a rifare il letto e cambiare la biancheria. I sanitari sono stati puliti male, dei capelli che si trovavano a terra nel bagno sono rimasti lì fino al sesto giorno, ovvero quando c'è ne siamo andati. Colazione non male eccetto per la macchina delle bevande che un paio di volte l'ho trovata piena di moscerini. Stanze forse un po' troppo piccole .. c'era lo spazio per una sola valigia e noi ne avevamo tre. La posizione però è ottima. Fermata metro a 100m, linea M7 utile per arrivare praticamente ovunque. Mi aspettavo molto di più, peccato davvero per l'ibis solitamente e sinonimo di qualità.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: UNE EXPERIENCE INOUBLIABLE
text: L'accueil est parfait, merci aux réceptionnistes pour leur disponibilité tout le long du séjour. Un grand merci particulièrement à Helori de l'équipe réception pour son aide et son efficacité. La force de cet hôtel est le staff et l'accueil chaleureux. Localisation idéale et chambres très propres, le top! La déco est moderne, tout est propre. Bravo à toute l'équipe!!
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Ottimo hotel vicino alla metro
text: Ho avuto la fortuna di trovare questo hotel per soggiornare qualche notte a Parigi ed è stata la migliore scelta che potessi fare; la permanenza è stata ottima grazie alla disponibilità dello staff. Comodissima la posizione vicina alla linea della metropolitana: la struttura è moderna e le camere pulite. Molto buona la 1a colazione molto ben assortita. Buona qualità del wi fi
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Excellent séjour  hôtel à recommander
text:
Excellent séjour à l'hôtel ibis Styles Paris Meteor.
Très bien situé, bus et métro à 2 mn à pied.
Centre de Paris en 20 mn en métro ( ligne 7 ).
Personnel très sympathique.
Chambre propre, literie confortable.  Thé, café et chocolat chaud à disposition au rez-de-chaussée. Petit déjeuner très correct. Excellent rapport qualité prix. 
A recommander pour un séjour à Paris.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie

title: Preis-Leistung in Ordnung.
text:
Es war Ok aber auch nicht mehr. 

Die Zimmer sind soweit modern, relativ geräumig und sauber, die Metro in der Nähe, für den Preis wirklich gut.

Die Reinigungskräfte nehmen Handtücher die zum trocknen hängen gerne mal mit und bringen dafür aber keine neuen, die Bar in der Lobby weigert sich alkoholische Getränke auszuschenken ab 22 Uhr.

Wasser und Kaffee den ganzen Tag gratis.
placeInfo/name: Ibis Styles Paris Meteor Avenue D'Italie
